title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Data hiding, data abstraction, parameterized type, exceptions, coercions, inheritence, multiple inheritance, functions as first class objects. Least fixed points of functions, lambda calculus functional programming, LISP, Sexpressions, list functions mathematical functions, APPLY and MAPCAR, lambda expressions.
